title: Sword and Wizards - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Ecchi   Harem   Mecha   Sci-fi   Seinen
tags: Male Protagonist   Nudity   Sword And Magic   Wizards
author: Yusura Kankitsu   柑橘 ゆすら
description:
Sasukiba Sorata is a genius swordsman in an age where magic is all he has to face as a swordsman without magic.

The story begins when he accepted for his talent in Enbu Academy of magic only for women, he meets Felicia which it is the number one magician and leader of “Seven-Star Knight”, the meeting was intended to cause drastic changes the fate of the world. When the strongest swordsman must undergo seven sorcerers – A new legendary history!>
